issue.title: [Rust] Add substring kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10019](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10019). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
substring returns a substring of a StringArray starting at a given index, and with a given optional length.

`fn substring(array: &Array, start: i32, length: &Option<u32>) -> Result<ArrayRef>`

This operation is common in strings, and it is useful for string-based transformations
